strategy: Replace the ensemble model with a neural network architecture using a deep feedforward network (e.g., 3-4 hidden layers with 128, 64, 32 neurons) and apply batch normalization and dropout regularization. Apply robust scaling to numerical inputs and use target encoding with smoothing for categorical variables. Optimize hyperparameters using Bayesian optimization with early stopping on R². This approach leverages non-linear modeling capacity and interaction learning to capture complex patterns missed by tree-based models.
